Join me @Livepeer @EmbassyDAO TONIGHT to close out #EthLatam with demos and pitches from the next generation of web3 builders 🇦🇷💫🚀 Register ⬇️
EmbassyDAO.eth: JUST IN: The last @ethlatam side event will be happening at @EmbassyDAO Node 1 🎉
⏱️ When? Sunday August 14, 2022 - 18hs
📍Where? 11 de Septiembre 858, CABA
We'll learn about what the Web3 community in 🇦🇷 is building while sharing great wine 🍷& beer 🍻
 https://www.eventbrite.com/e/embassydao-demo-day-ethlatam-side-event-tickets-400969038187

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT 🐘🔗 sam.arweave.dev
Recently, a helpful community website -- 
Fortunately, there was a copy on the permaweb.
Now it has a permanent Arweave name: 
Permaweb apps don't fail you when you need them.
ArNS > DNS.
siegfried.arweave.dev 🐘 🎈 🧬: @samecwilliams @benjileibo The Arweave Fees calculator now has a short and easy to remember ArNS address: 
H/T to the builder of the permapage, who is not me and whom I do not know.
 http://ar-fees.arweave.dev
